problem_text_cn: 如图,在正五边形ABCDE中,BA=BC=BD=BE,且AE∥BC,若∠A=60°,则∠CDE的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the regular pentagon ABCDE, BA = BC = BD = BE, and AE ∥ BC, if ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠CDE is ()
raw_answer: 因为∠A=60°,BA=BE,所以∠ABE=∠AEB=60°,因为AE||BC,所以∠EBC=60°,又因为BE=BC,BD=BD,DE=DC,得ABDE≡△BDC得∠EBD=∠CBD=30°,∠EDB=∠CDB=75°,所以∠EDC=150°.故选C.
